channel.title: Turning e-cigarette into bad usb device
channel.description:
Hi all,
I am currently looking for turning a e-cigarette (vape) into a bad USB device. Therefore, I am searching for any technical articles that might cover either e-cigarettes & malware, turning charging devices into HIDs or anything else comparable. Does anyone of you already did something like this or know some good reads?
Cheerio, ten1

item.title: Turning e-cigarette into bad usb device
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Turning e-cigarette into bad usb device
